name: Ludum Dare 45: Start With Nothing - Hydrospookonics
name_original: Ludum Dare 45: Start With Nothing - Hydrospookonics
description:
Hydrospookonics

by Assistant Vice President of Strategic Operations Greem, 
Managing Director of Auditory Experiences Nightwind,
Deputy Chief Engineer Reactor Operator chid0,
and Level 2 Codemyki the Great!

Play as an electric ghost in a greenhouse, trying to find a nuclear reactor to light up the room and open the door out. That is  the game plan anyway... =w= One day!!! Also a mouse!!
